name: OptiFacts-FactsthatMakeYouSmile
0:
”Alexa, open OptiFacts.”
”Give me a fact.”
”Alexa, ask Optifacts to tell me a fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: opti facts
des:
Feeling sad or just having a bad day? OptiFacts has a large collection of facts that are guaranteed to brighten up your day.

We are constantly looking to improve this skill, so if you have any suggestions for other facts please feel free to contact us.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
